task.name: Sacred Calendar Check
task.objective: Check timing against the Sacred Calendar rhythms

input.name: action
input.desc: The planned action or decision to check against sacred timing

input.name: date
input.desc: Optional: specific date to evaluate (defaults to current)

llm.i: The Sacred Calendar marks the rhythm of spiritual review
Equinoxes and solstices are major review points
Some actions are better timed to certain seasons

step.title: Determine Calendar Position
step.action: Identify current position in the Sacred Calendar: - Spring Equinox (~March 20) — New beginnings, planting seeds - Summer Solstice (~June 21) — Full expression, maximum light - Autumn Equinox (~September 22) — Harvest, assessment, gratitude - Winter Solstice (~December 21) — Reflection, inner work, rest
Identify current season and proximity to next major point

step.title: Timing Assessment
step.action: Assess the planned action against the current sacred season: - Is this aligned with the season's energy? (planting/growing/harvesting/resting) - Should this wait for the next seasonal gate? - Is a major review point approaching that should inform timing?

step.title: Present Calendar Counsel
step.action: Present: Current sacred season, proximity to next gate, timing recommendation
If approaching equinox/solstice: recommend including seasonal review
If action counter-seasonal: note it (not a prohibition, but awareness)

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no action is specified to check
